go_data.justification: p97 is the mammal homolog of yeast Cdc48p, which is the main ERAD ATPase.
p97 is involved in ERAD, indicating its location in the endoplasmic reticulum.

go_data.term: protein retrotranslocation from ER to cytosol
go_data.justification: The p97-Ufd1-Npl4 complex functions in retrotranslocation from the ER to the cytosol.
